name: Gecko Moria
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Thriller Bark Pirates
effect: [Activate: Main] You may place 4 {Thriller Bark Pirates} type cards from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order: This Character gains [Banish] and +1000 power during this turn. (When this card deals damage, the target card is trashed without activating its Trigger.)
